attributes.action: Repeal the vote on the motion to extend free meals for schoolchildren
attributes.additional_details: To help schoolchildren and families facing hardship at this time, If there is not enough perhaps the MPs who voted against could give up their daily meal at the Members Club
attributes.background: The vote needs to be overturned and this motion allowed so schoolchildren get their free meals. The Government need to find the money or ask the MPs to give up their meal at the members club daily.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555727
